title: This is happend after i just started a game..
body:
Can i just understand why my launcher forced to start a repair operation 
just right after the champ select ? and will i be consider as a leaver because of 
how bad the client is ?

https://freeimages-hd.com/images/2017/06/28/Screenshot_2.jpg

replies.body: Happened to me one of the times league froze then my computer crashed, I fixed it by simply restarting my computer.

Mine is saying the same thing i've done what the website suggests any other ideas?
i have also used the hextech repair tool and it says things are good.

It looks like your connection is blocked from reaching our services, so the patcher can't reach the authentication servers or even determine if you're actually online.  

My suggestion would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Make sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities!  

You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case it's causing a block.

Let me know if it works out for you.
